title: Earth from Above: 366 Days
description: A revised edition of Earth from 365 Days, this breathtaking compilation of aerial images of the earth, including nearly two hundred all-new photographs, offers full-color visuals by the acclaimed photographer, accompanied by informative captions that explain the background of each image as well as essays on such topics as biodiversity, energy, and global warming. 100,000 first printing.
author: Yann Arthus-Bertrand
